text: Walter Kieber (20 February 1931 â€“ 21 June 2014) was a Liechtenstein politician. He was born in Feldkirch, Austria. Kieber was the Prime Minister of Liechtenstein from 1974 to 1978. He was a member of the Progressive Citizens' Party. He died on 21 June 2014 from prostate cancer in Vaduz, Liechtenstein, aged 83.Alt-Regierungschef Kieber mit 83 gestorben (in German) ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:People from Vorarlberg Category:Prime Ministers of Liechtenstein
title: Walter Kieber
